attributes.action: compel drivers of vehicles and motorcyclists to drive with dipped headlights on from lighting-up time on 30 September to sunrise on 1 April each year in the interests of enhanced road safety.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly motorists are failing to use dipped headlights in times of poor visibility - and this includes drivers of police and other emergency vehicles. By following the example of other countries and compelling the use of dipped headlights at certain times, the visibility of other vehicles will be enhanced and this will, in turn, help to reduce the number of accidents caused by insufficient or non-existent vehicle lighting during times of poor visibility.
